name: locallyjs
description: Locally is a localStorage manager that supports expirable values with TTL and saves space by compressing them using LZW algorithm.
author: Ozan Tunca <ozan@ozantunca.org> (http://www.ozantunca.org/)

scripts.test: mocha --require ts-node/register test/node-mocha.ts --exit && mocha --require ts-node/register test/node-mocha.ts --mode=dist --exit && mocha --require ts-node/register test/node-mocha.ts --mode=distmin --exit && mocha --require ts-node/register test/node-mocha.ts --mode=light --exit
scripts.build: tsc && npx browserify dist/locally.js -o dist/locally.combined.js -s locallyjs && npx uglifyjs dist/locally.combined.js -o dist/locally.min.js && rm -f dist/locally.combined.js && npx browserify dist/light.js -o dist/locally-light.js -s locallyjs && npx uglifyjs dist/locally-light.js -o dist/light.min.js && rm -f dist/locally-light.js && npm run build:browsertest
